participant_2.background:
I'm not comfortable sharing my ethnic background.
last season i was just getting started.
my favorite food is mashed potatoes.
i am the youngest of five.
i write fiction for fun.

content.text: Hey there! what are you doing today?
Not much, just writing some fiction for fun.
What kind of fiction do you like to write?
I like to write about aliens invading the earth, I think it's a really interesting concept.
That sounds really cool! What's your favorite part about writing that type of fiction?
I think my favorite part is coming up with the different ways that the aliens could invade and how the humans would react.
That sounds really fun! I'd love to read some of your work if you have anything published online.
Thanks! I have a few things published on Wattpad, if you're familiar with that platform.
I am not, but I'll check it out!
It's a great platform for sharing your writing with others.
Sounds good! I'll definitely check it out. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm always happy to help out a fellow writer.
